title: Cuff, ca. 1890
medium: white cotton on white linen; example of button-hole stitch]=
provenance: "it is understood that the pieces in this lot may be exchanged by Marian Hague for others more useful to the Museum collection if such become available." - from the catalogue card in Registrar's Office Catalogue File.
description: Study card: c/: cuff with Van Dyke edge cut in small scallops and worked in button-hole, overcasting, and loop stitches. See also: 1942-7-2-a, b which were originally a st with this object, and are deaccessioned.

tombstone.epitaph: Cuff, ca. 1890. white cotton on white linen; example of button-hole stitch]=. 1942-7-2-c.
